text: Franca Pilla or Franca Ciampi (born 19 December 1920) is an Italian socialite and educator. She was the first lady of Italy, when Carlo Azeglio Ciampi was president of the Italian Republic from 1999 to 2006. Pilla turned 100 in December 2020. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:Italian centenarians Category:Living people Category:Italian educators
title: Franca Pilla
